description:
As we open our scene with our new cutie recruit, Cam, we find out that he's just on the verge of getting out of the military, and 'extremely' excited by that prospect. Smooth as silk Cam is 22-years old, stands 5'9' tall and weighs 150 lbs.

Sports is a popular past time for Cam, as he played football, basketball and ran track for three years back in high school. He's also got a secret fantasy to share with us -- ok, not so secret, since he tells us about it. He wants to have sex on the roof of a skyscraper. I'm not sure if we can manage that one here on the site, but hey, you never know. (I'm thinking he might get blown off the roof by high winds, and not an incredible blow job.)

Cam's got a tight little body, with some colorful tattoos across his chest and abs. Every time he bends over, all of his abs muscles come popping out, giving us that cheese-grater look.

I want to say right here: Cam's ass is just perfect. It's really the star of the show and you're going to go gaga when you see it. Mid-way through his solo, he flips over so we can get a bit of an ass show, and we get up nice and close. So close that you can see the complete lack of hair anywhere on his rear end. This young man is hairless everywhere, so if you like that kind of thing, you're gonna just love Cam.
title: Cam
